    loadPoleFigure_plf

    loadPoleFigure_plfedit page

    load plf file

    View Code

    Syntax

    pf = loadPoleFigure_plf(fname,<options>)

    Input

    fname

    file name

    Output

    pf

    [[PoleFigure_index.html,PoleFigure]]
